website_summaries.verdict: This energy bar holds up in extreme temperatures without losing its flavor or chewy texture.
pros: Great chocolate flavor highlights this very chewy protein bar, which also contains less fat than competing products
Doesn’t melt, even on hot days spent hiking or training
cons: There’s a strong aftertaste, and some find the bar too sweet

customer_reviews.title: The Incredible Shrinking Powerbar!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product for nearly 30 years. On the most recent shipment, noticed that the bar has shrunken considerably, but the wrapper remains the same size! I wish food manufacturers would just raise the price instead of playing the deceptive game of keeping price the same while reducing the amount provided.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Chewy!  I like that!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the crumbly power bars that melt easily or fall apart. I eat one before I work out with a bottle of water and they work just great for me. Easy to store and taste good too.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer, bad for winter
customer_reviews.text: I take it with me while riding bikes, though its good in the summer, in the winter you cannot eat that - it turns into a solid rock. If you buy it - make sure its inside the bag so it wont get frozen / solid rock.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Goldschmidt

customer_reviews.title: These are the Original Power Bars
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a site to obtain the original Power Bars. They are difficult to find with all the versions and competitors, but these are still the best and most versatile for throwing in your pocket or backpack. They fill you up, they weather the heat and cold. Best of all Amazon ships amazingly fast. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: No artificial sweetners and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Decent amount of protein. No artificial sweetners. And tastes great. Hard to find in the stores lately, so ordering here is easier and cheaper. Glad they still make these, because I hate their newer bars.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Sally

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I like the Power Bar brand. The only issue I have is that it will melt if it gets heated up by the sun which was the case when I put them at the top of my pack. This is a non issue because it was still edible and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you enjoy chewing on tires
customer_reviews.text: Eeeewwwww, these are gross. The texture is strange and the taste is worse. It’s almost like taffy, but not as stretchy. These are hard to chew and give me a burning sensation in the back of my throat. My jaw literally is sore after eating one. I’ve had two from the box, I gave them a second chance and fully regret it.
customer_reviews.author: MommyinOregon

customer_reviews.title: I like to eat an energy bar prior to exercising and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to eat an energy bar prior to exercising and the Chocolate Power Bar has been good for me for many years. It gives me energy for the exercise without feeling like I have something in my stomach. It seems like they have changed the formula from a couple of years ago, which, in my opinion, is not as good as before. Plus, they stopped carrying them in Publix for some unknown reason. Most energy bars are made for after exercising. They need more bars for before and during exercising
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dennis P. Mohney

customer_reviews.title: Best power bar, not in store anymore.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only power bar I can actually eat. All the others are dry. I actually get a little lift in the afternoon without drinking tea or coffee. The stores don't sell these particular kinds anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lorz

customer_reviews.title: PowerBar delivers
customer_reviews.text: Just one of these bars powers me through bike rides, hikes and multiple sets of tennis. Taste could be better but can’t beat the results.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: power bar
customer_reviews.text: good energy contribution for the endurance sports , good taste
customer_reviews.author: Roger C

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and protein load
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack before a work out. I typically eat half one one about an hour before a workout in the morning. It quenches my hunger and provides an energy boost for the workout.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Long time user
customer_reviews.text: Been eating these for close to 30 years for running, cycling and daughters swims. Taste has changed and not for better. Newer Ones taste almost stale / aweful
customer_reviews.author: LIGAL

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 25 years now. Tastes a bit like chocolate covered rope but gives me the energy to ride an extra 20 miles so I keep coming back. Like them much better than the Honey Stinger products. Will probably keep eating them for another 25 years, inshallah
customer_reviews.author: Pop N Wood

customer_reviews.title: Second-best powerbars ever
customer_reviews.text: I miss wild berry powerbars, and wish the company would bring them back. But for long as they aren't, these are the best alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Neurasthenic

customer_reviews.title: When will  the Chocolate Power Bars be back??
customer_reviews.text: When will these be back? I've used power Bars for at least 25 years and I'm down to my last box. Like others, I use these for an energy boost whether its hiking to get that 1,000 feet of elevation or catch my lowering blood sugar while working on the property. I Miss Them! I go through 10 plus boxes a year.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: love these bars
customer_reviews.text: love these bars, had to order them because Kroger has stopped carrying them in there stores. When I am out ridding these give me energy to complete my ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a start up!
customer_reviews.text: They have been a go to staple, for my 72 hr kit, early morning walks, etc. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Very filling and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: These are very chewy and satisfying. They can replace a whole meal.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Boxes and bars were great quality and a great price! Cheaper than buying at the store and came in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Djarnag

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who plays high school football. He has only eaten one because it was too difficult to get through the first bar. A waste of money, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Ward

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date August  2017, REALLY?
customer_reviews.text: Very Unhappy. Expiration Date is August 2017, less than 3 months from now. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Mingle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with a classic. Feeling hungry? ...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with a classic. Feeling hungry? Eat one of these and you’ll be set for hours. Post workout? Eat one to get the protein needed.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum D. Burcham

customer_reviews.title: It's satisfying and chewy plus good protein
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike I like the convenience of the bar when I am on the go,the taste is great and I feel it's on the healthy side of a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Amount wrong
customer_reviews.text: Taste is fine. Only got 10 in the 12-pack I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas J

customer_reviews.title: Old school rules!
customer_reviews.text: Wish these were easier to find... been using them for over 20years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for long trainings
customer_reviews.text: This bars are a great product, they deliver consistent energy through my long trainings. I bought the chocolate ones and the taste is very good, when I'm training I look forward for the next bite. The only problem is that they get stuck to the packaging and it is difficult to remove the product while cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Diaz

customer_reviews.title: The Only Energy Bar My Husband Likes
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great product. We keep them in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Chocaolate Power Bar
customer_reviews.text: Great for during or after workout. Keeps you from eating junk food, as it fills you up. Great buy. It's now on my monthly delivery list.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi S

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate flavor is good and it's filling for few hours.
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite performance bars. I am glad to find them here on Amazon at good price. I bought them in store for years until they discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: beachrungirl

customer_reviews.title: They have less ingredients than other bars and are an energy bar.
customer_reviews.text: I have using Power Bars for about 20 years now and if I do not have one I can tell, with out them I feel run down.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rettie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was berry smoothie 😩
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate flavor but I loved it more when it was berry smoothie one. It was the best!
customer_reviews.author: sanela pandzic

customer_reviews.title: For the trails
customer_reviews.text: I take these mountain biking. I don't have to worry about them melting. The taste is good and they do help
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: We need chocolate Powerbars!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten over 10,000 chocolate Powerbars and I want to continue. Please bring them back!
customer_reviews.author: Tom the cyclist

customer_reviews.title: Still available?
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate Powebars. I can’t find them anywhere. Who sells them?
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lowenstein

customer_reviews.title: Always consistent service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is always great and the distributor is also excellent, great prices and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy ODell

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 boxes, every bar in both boxes basically crumbled when took bite. Every bar. Had to throw all away.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the tastiest bar in the world (energy bars never ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the tastiest bar in the world (energy bars never succeed in that department) but it does what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of chocolate Powerbars. Unfortunately, the shipment ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of chocolate Powerbars. Unfortunately, the shipment of 3 boxes I just received, while still within the expiration date, were not as fresh as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crummy
customer_reviews.text: These are dry and crumbly. Not at all like the ones I've gotten for years
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find them, but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find these readily in stores anymore, so I am really glad I can get them here. However, they don't seem to be as fresh as I remember and I sometimes wonder if they've been stockpiled. I'm still glad they can still be bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PowerBar
customer_reviews.text: Some folks don't care for the taste, but I happen to like them, they pack well, and and they work !
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they give me the most energy for my run and no longer selling in stores
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not find them anymore at the stores. A little smaller that I remember
customer_reviews.author: julie nordlander

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: The label on this bar doesn't show much energy souce, other than sugar. Energy comes from fats, and fat content was very low. Taste was awful, and it was tough to chew. Especially if you are a senior and don't have perfect teeth. The chocolate taste was more like ex-lax, an old laxative. And yes, it produced stomach bloating.
customer_reviews.author: Casan

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: So.. yeah.. nope. I would suggest you pass on these. Think about a taffy feel. With the taste of low end chocolate protein powder.. yeah.. that chalk taste. Add a spoonful of salt to eat bite. And the aftertaste is what I can only describe as burnt caramel.. in the worst way imaginable. On the plus side, the wrapper is nice.. but it sticks to the bar like crazy glue.
customer_reviews.author: L. Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Great basic energy bar
customer_reviews.text: These are good tasting energy bars that last a long time and are convenient to carry when cycling. The PowerBar brand and this specific energy bar style is one of the first energy bars that I remember before other competitors like Clif Bar came along. This PowerBar is a classic simple energy food that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainPico

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor, not too sweet, satisfies hunger
customer_reviews.text: I have always eaten this flavor Power Bar, but it is getting impossible to find in stores, so very glad that they had it on-line. It satisfies my hunger for hiking, walking, cycling, and in-between meals when I am somewhere that I can't buy anything healthy. It is not sweet, and its chewiness makes it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: spunky

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the ingredients or how they make them has changed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these PowerBars for years for breakfast and they have always been my "go to" for a snack. I ordered three boxes just recently 5.27.19 and they arrived as expected. I took a bite out of the first one expecting it to be that gooey texture which I love, and instead, it was hard, grainy and had a really strange tasty AND they are about 1/2" shorter! I'm so sad because I don't know what I'm going to do without them. I've tried a lot of bars that are out there and have only found PowerBars to satisfy me.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Severance

customer_reviews.title: Performance Fuel
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for many years as a pre-workout or mountain biking snack--they're tasty, digest quickly, and provide necessary nutrients. Getting them from Amazon as they seem to be getting harder to find now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste and resiatency to heat
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy these bars. I use them as a break durring work also on my long walks. Its a great snack and pick me up. Since it ia not tipical chocolate it is a lot more resistant to melting compared to other chocolate products. The packaging is simple and eaay to rip open. It has great gritty taste. It does not lack in chocolate and great boost of sudden energy
customer_reviews.author: Ermilo

customer_reviews.title: This dog still hunts
customer_reviews.text: My husband relied heavily on these while bicycling across the US back in the 1990's, but found the "new, improved" Power Bars not nearly as effective. He was very pleased to find they're still being made.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the run
customer_reviews.text: My job can be fast paced and I don't always get a chance to sit down and eat. These are perfect for shoving in your face while on the run. I don't crash from them, and they taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: mitsaru

customer_reviews.title: Chewy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I was upset to see many stores no longer have this original type of Power Bars, so I was glad to see these. They are smooth and chewy, which I prefer to the more commonplace crunchy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All day energy!
customer_reviews.text: Power Bars are my go to energy. They provide long lasting energy, more than enough to finish my busy day at work or at home.
customer_reviews.author: CaroleH

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast Bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 cases of these when they were 9ish bucks a box as my morning "breakfast bar" and I never got tired of the taste, but now that they're around 13 bucks and I can get them or a different bar cheaper in the store.
customer_reviews.author: TDjuniord3

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good and they do the job providing enough protein to replace a meal if necessary. However these are not like the old style ones that were actually pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Shores Family Five

customer_reviews.title: Better than most protein bars tried
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased several times. Like flavors. Especially good with morning coffee or milk
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harke

customer_reviews.title: Delicious AND Healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and perfect to throw in my purse so I always have a healthy snack on hand! They fit right in to my new, healthier lifestyle, and the price is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Embrace

customer_reviews.title: Good meal supplement or quick energy snack
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how good these tasted but the consistency was a little weird like a tootsie roll with oats in it or something.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as before.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these 3 stars, due to the bar not being the same as before. Powerbar is making these bars different now, they are more condensed now, and whenever you open the package, the bar gets stuck on the wrapper and its actually not something easy to eat as it used to be. The bar itself still tastes the same and has the same ingredients though.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I use this product before I go to workout. Taste good and does not give me a full feeling. Does give me the energy to get through my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Salter

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loves these things and was delighted to receive them as a gift from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the regular power bar that i get from gas stations but this thing is sticky and tastes horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Samrat

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite treat with coffee... like a candy bar but healthier
customer_reviews.author: bobelinski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to have on hand in outdoor adventures.
customer_reviews.text: My go to "survival" food for hikes & road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Nethercot

customer_reviews.title: Oops.  Not a protein bar at all
customer_reviews.text: Quality and service were without complaint. After reading the specifications, this is a sugar bar. No protein.
customer_reviews.author: Comic Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to find in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores and I am a fan of the original power bar
customer_reviews.author: MissMookus

customer_reviews.title: Grab-n-go...
customer_reviews.text: Great pick me up, great price. I need to eat as I go. These are in my dash buttons
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious sweet treat if you don't want a snickers loaded with ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious sweet treat if you don't want a snickers loaded with fat. I eat these before a workout for a boost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack before a run
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these bars for years! Perfect snack before a run, soccer or long bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: Love these more than candy bar!
customer_reviews.text: My go to bar when I need quick carbs in the form of chocolate to keep up with my toddler!! Started eating these as a competitive swimmer and now eating them to keep up as a mom.
customer_reviews.author: ZeldaBarbie99

customer_reviews.title: Some like them some don't
customer_reviews.text: I just get a hankering for these bars. Some like them some don't. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Well priced at just over a dollar per bar.
customer_reviews.author: Car Audio Expert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training supplement
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A bar before a marathon, half before long training runs. Tastes pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Kangas

customer_reviews.title: solid energy support during workout
customer_reviews.text: gives a good burst of energy support during my workout.
customer_reviews.author: pat wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love these Power Bars
customer_reviews.text: I love Power Bars, but I will not order them again. The price went from $9.00 to$20. I'll be looking for a cheaper snack.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like how it doesn't melt too a gooey mess in the summer heat!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: ... use these bars as a replacement meal they taste good and satisfy
customer_reviews.text: I use these bars as a replacement meal they taste good and satisfy.
customer_reviews.author: epsiloneon

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting as usual
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these, & the peanut butter, bars for years. They arrived in good shape & taste great!
customer_reviews.author: 2ndChance

customer_reviews.title: On time and packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Use it pre-excercise and mid exercise. Good balance of low fat and glucose to give an immediate boost of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Marashi

customer_reviews.title: hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for when I am on a job and don't have time to take a lunch break [the norm] and want to get some energy to carry me through. Caffeine gives me the jitters if I have too much and these bars are reasonably nutritious! Also good for boating, the beach, etc. when you just need a little something to keep on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Britton

product_meta.title: PowerBar Performance Energy Bar, Chocolate, 2.29 Ounce Bars (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: The PowerBar Performance Energy Bar is a great choice for use before and during training sessions and high-endurance competitions like running, cycling, and swimming. Provides a high quality Max Energy carbohydrate blend; a 2:1 glucose to fructose blend found to deliver 20 to 50 percent more energy to muscles than glucose alone. Contains 200mg sodium, a key electrolyte lost in sweat that is associated with muscle cramping in some athletes.
feature_bullets: Each energy bar contains 9g protein, 20% DV Iron
A convenient energy bar for use before and during training sessions and high-endurance competitions like running, cycling and swimming
Max Energy 2: 1 Fructose: Glucose Blend, Non-GMO Project Verified, No Preservatives or Artificial Flavors, Gluten Free
Available in 2 delicious flavors: Peanut Butter and Chocolate
